# Home Page

vuepress-theme-hope improves the defulat home page.

## Frontmatter

### home

Activate hope page style if `true`

### title

Title, default is `'Hello'`

### heroImage

Logo src

### heroText

Logo alt text

### tagline

Add-on text, default is `'Welcome to your VuePress site'`

### actionText

Button text

### actionLink

Button link

### features

Type: `Array`
Interface:

- title
- details
- link(optional)

Feature description
